title: Jacket
description: reddish brown pounded jacket with front opening; front longer than back; multiple bands of commerical braid on front opening, around neck, shoulders and sleeves; bands purple with geometric designs and some floral motifs; two woven ties at lower front; lined in black
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
